title: Bad Luck Strikes Simbu Again: Selvaraghavan's Kaan Hits A Roadblock
text:
Posted by: Avinash Gopinath Updated: Tuesday, October 13, 2015, 12:23 [IST] 
Unfortunately, it looks like Simbu has hit a patch of bad luck as his upcoming project Kaan , being directed by Selvaraghavan , is now facing an uncertainty over its continuance. 
After being in a hapless situation before the release of Vaalu , Simbu is still in a spot of bother when it comes to releasing his Idhu Namma Aalu . Now, Kaan too, might face a similar situation as the film has been put on hold, according to sources. 
This project had its share of agitation when Varun Manian , who was supposed to bankroll Kaan , backed away from it after citing Selvaraghavan's deferment as he had taken out time to settle his issues with PVP Cinemas following the Irandaam Ulagam debacle. 
Deserted by its producer, the comparatively high budget film was taken up by Gitanjali Selvaraghavan, Siddharth Rao and the director himself in an attempt to complete the project. 
But that idea has been bestowed with a body blow as the film is currently stalled citing financial issues, according to a report. 
Trisha, who was earlier roped in to play the female lead has walked out of the project due to conflicting schedules with some of her other films, making way for Catherine Tresa.
